name: @cycle/http
description: A Cycle.js Driver for making HTTP requests
author: Andre Staltz

scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && npm run test-node && zuul --no-coverage -- test/browser.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.browserify: npm run lib && browserify lib/index.js --global-transform=browserify-shim --standalone CycleHTTPDriver --exclude xstream --outfile dist/cycle-http-driver.js
scripts.prelib: rm -rf lib/ && mkdirp lib && typings install
scripts.dist: npm run browserify && npm run uglify && npm run docs
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm run dist; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm run dist; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm run dist; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish --access=public
